attributes.action: Ban all sporting matches against Russia until Putin gets his troops out
attributes.additional_details: These will certainly be used for propoganda purposes and could pose danger to those from UK visiting or taking part
attributes.background: Legislate that no UK teams play against Russian teams either international or individual either on Russian soil or anywhere in the world until Russia withdraws from all land seized in Crimea, or Donetsk since 2013

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about sanctions in relation to sporting events are a matter for sports bodies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
